title: Five-Star Cordoba Stay within a Roman-Style Villa
description: Built with a thoughtfully resorted Roman-style villa, Hospes Palacio del Bailío is an oasis in the centre of Cordoba that combines old-world luxury with modern touches. Escape to this urban retreat in city's heart and explore nearby sights including the Cordoba mosque just a short walk away. Plunge into a crystal-clear pool framed by fruit trees, dine on locally inspired dishes at Arbequina restaurant, be pampered with soothing massage at Bodnya Spa or soak at the hotel's indoor Roman Baths.
offer_address: Ramírez de las Casas Deza 10-12, 14001 Córdoba Spain
